content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 0, Hércules 2.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 0, Hércules 2.

Foul by Seydou Keita (Barcelona).

Attempt saved. David Trezeguet (Hércules) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
